Html:
Hi radioman!

In my application I frequently add lots of markers (20000+) to the map and remove them again with

overlay.Markers.Clear();

Does this call Dispose() on each marker? If not, what is the correct way to release memory?

Thanks a lot!

It doesn't, but the best method is to reuse objects, there is no real clearing of the memory in .net anyway.

..yeah i gues if you don't intend to reuse the marker, call dispose for it.
